page.title: 09A Day in Grimsby, Part 3.
page.content: at dinner time. From 1.15 to 1.50 we have{P.E.}We play{rounders}(our usual game) After having a good run around we have{Topic.}My{Topic}is on{pop {groups.}I do this with my friend. After break we have{Geography.}At the moment we are doing about{planets,}and we have already made a{globe.}This lasts for one hour then it's home time. I walk home with my friend as she lives near me. I have my tea at 5.00, then watch{TV}for the rest of the night. That is if I have no homework. At 10.30 I go to bed.{ This account of a typical day was written by a 12 year old schoolgirl.
